resources.string: Address : Asmalımescit Cad. No:29/4 Beyoğlu - İstanbul

Hike East is a free guidebook bringing tons of great information about traveling in Turkey right to your fingertips, including discounts on all kinds of services throughout the country, from hostel stays to drinks to extreme sports experiences.

We provide an easy-to-understand, useful and up-to-date guidebook to make your travels in Turkey as memorable and affordable as possible, and best of all, all this info is completely on the house!
On our website, you can find a range of resouces designed to help you out whether you are planning a trip to Turkey or already here. Talk to fellow travelers on the forums, learn about upcoming events, sell your stuff (or buy someone elses), or plan where to stay in your next port of call.
You can pick up a print version of the guidebook from any of the awesome hostels, restaurants, and companies featured in Hike East.
Did we mention its free?
